name: Toothless Vampire (Bjoerklund)
description:
You are Vlad, the toothless vampire. Luckily enough you don't need teeth for slaying your foes.

W - Jump - Jump Midair = transform into a bat

A/D - Move

S - Dash downwards (Kills enemies if enough momentum and in bat form)

Escape - Main menu / End game

Space - Attack

Don't let your blood level run out or fall down. You have to kill enemies, or take short rests to get blood back. To kill the enemies you need to move between platforms and for that you need your blood. Oh and and be careful, those archers can give you a rough time if not careful.

Technical

This is the post-jam build for the GMTK game jam of July 2017. Game jam  version can be found on original site for the jam entry (by my co-dev).
https://derjulien.itch.io/toothless-vampire

- Made in Game Maker Studio 2
- Sprites made with Asesprite
- BGM : https://opengameart.org/content/slow-melancholic-theme-c64-style

IMPORTANT !                                                                                                                                                               Apparently there have been issues with the game triggering the Anti Virus software "Norton" - This is a well known problem with GMS2 and I can't change anything about it :/
